page.title: About
page._content:
Welcome to foodie.
Here, you will be able to experience the ultimate appreciation of food——truly know what you are gonna eat.
For those who love hunting food, they are usually concerned about three important factors: appearance, taste and price of food. Foodie will analyze these three factors comprehensively to feast your eyes, rumble your stomach and save your wallet.
Join foodie and let us help you eat something truly good!
